titles.title: To provide for a demonstration project to improve provision of certain benefits under the Social Security Act through a private aid program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E967)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for a demonstration project (New Hope Project, Inc.) of a private aid program in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, that provides low-income residents with child and medical care equivalent to that provided under the Social Security Act.
